subject.geographic: Bayou Grosse Tete, Pt. Coupee, La

mods.abstract: $20 REWARD. RANAWAY from the subscriber, on Grosse Tete, JEFF, a negro man, aged 26 years, about 6 feet high, raw-boned, and his two upper front teeth partly broken. Also, SIMON, another negro, aged 23 years, 5 feet 4 inches high, very stout built. Both are from Tennessee, lately purchased. They had on their blue pantaloons and blue jackets; one wore a grey wool hat, and the other a cap, and had the appearance in dress of negroes lately purchased. I will pay the above reward for their arrest and delivery to me, or in the jail of this parish, or $10 for the arrest of one. Bayou Grosse Tete, Pt. Coupee, La., May 5, 1860. A. WIEDMAN, At John Buford's.

detail.title: Pointe Coupee Democrat. : (False River [i.e. New Roads], Parish of Pointe Coupee [La.]) 1858-1894
